Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pDim
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: dimension name, accepts wildcards (if = *, then all the dimensions)

Parameters.Name: pHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: hierarchy name (if blank then same named hierarchy as dimension is assumed), accepts wildcards (if = *, then all hierarchies)

Parameters.Name: pEle
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: filter on elements (delimiter separated list of elements, accepts wildcards (if = *, then all the elements in hierarchy get deleted))

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: delimiter character for element list (default value if blank = '&')
